name: MeanCorpuscularVolume
title: Mean Corpuscular Volume
description: Note - "This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains laboratory observable term codes for Mean Corpuscular Volume results in blood.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to discover or request blood Mean Corpuscular Volume levels in clinical records.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes laboratory LOINC encoded observable terms representing Mean Corpuscular Volume terms in blood.),(Exclusion Criteria: Laboratory LOINC encoded terms that do not represent Mean Corpuscular Volume terms in blood.)
